p:
The severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) is responsible for the COVID-19 disease as originally shown in Wuhan, China, as early as documented from 1 December 2019 (ref.
1 ). On 11 March 2020, the WHO announced COVID-19 as a worldwide pandemic, 2 months after the official disclosure from the Chinese government of the actual cluster epidemics in Whuan
2 .
